ValidationRule.description: Cannot enter a plan transfer date if there are pending transfer tasks
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
NOT(ISNULL( X401k_Plan_Asset_Transfer_Completed__c ))&& ( CONTAINS( Pending_Transfer_Tasks__c , "Unresolved Paperwork Discrepancy")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Transfer_Tasks__c, "CPR NPR Callout") || CONTAINS( Pending_Transfer_Tasks__c, "Plan Liquidation")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Transfer_Tasks__c, "Resolve Valuation Edit Issue")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Transfer_Tasks__c, "SDBA Balance Issue")|| CONTAINS( Pending_Transfer_Tasks__c, "Resolve Plan Liquidation Issuet")
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot enter a Transfer Complete date until Pending Tasks are completed
